title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 109.2 - Statement adoption
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 109.2 - Statement adoption

State Regulations

These rules and regulations as adopted by the authority are
to become effective on May 1, 1988 and are the implementation of its prompt
payment policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
109.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
